channel.title: !_!RSgodscape Development Team Needed!_!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/ddj311.gif[/img] Welcome to the RSgodscape Development Team application thread! [hr]
RSgodscape is a skilling/pvp server, and offers many hours of gameplay without getting bored due to the high volume of skills, games, and things to do that include:
[ul][li]Perfect PvP/Hybridding - Multi barrage aswell![/li] [li]Duel Arena with staking![/li] [li]Competative Highscores[/li] [li]Pest control with working void[/li] [li]Slayer is a fun skill that makes good money and shows you new places through the maps[/li][/ul]
And much more... [/list] [hr]
What we [b]HAVE[/b]
[ul][li]Highscores[/li] [li]Webclient[/li] [li]Website (.com)[/li] [li]Amazing Pvp[/li] [li]10x hits[/li] [li]New hp bars[/li] [li]changeable gameframe[/li][/ul]
What we [b]NEED[/b]
[ul][li]New ancient curses[/li] [li]Rocktails[/li] [li]Working Dragon claws (not shitty ones, ones that have the right hits and animations)[/li][/ul]
[hr]
We have no coders at all, for the forums, client, or server. So i will be needing some.
[b]Application[/b]
[code]Name: Applying for: Past experience: MSN (if any): Other info:[/code] [hr]
Contact me at Pixel-Hugger@hotmail.com
[/center]

item.title: !_!RSgodscape Development Team Needed!_!
item.dc:creator: @blu3 blu3
item.description:
@blu3 wrote:

Kay qbix is part of the development team. Only looking for someone whos EXTREMELY good with models. (i.e. adding new whip models, dragon claws, new curses… etc.) [PI]

@blu3 wrote:

[center]

Welcome to the RSgodscape Development Team application thread!
[hr]

RSgodscape is a skilling/pvp server, and offers many hours of gameplay without getting bored due to the high volume of skills, games, and things to do that include:

[ul][li]Perfect PvP/Hybridding - Multi barrage aswell![/li]
[li]Duel Arena with staking![/li]
[li]Competative Highscores[/li]
[li]Pest control with working void[/li]
[li]Slayer is a fun skill that makes good money and shows you new places through the maps[/li][/ul]

And much more…

[li]Amazing Pvp[/li]

[li]New hp bars[/li]

[li]Working Dragon claws (not shitty ones, ones that have the right hits and animations)[/li][/ul]

We have no coders at all, for the forums, client, or server. So i will be needing some.
